# **Government Tender Announcement**

## **Project Title:** EZ897-240725 - Airport LTF Decommissioning - Whitehorse, YT

**Project Background:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), through the Government of Canada, invites bids to decommission the Land Treatment Facility (LTF) at the Whitehorse Airport in Whitehorse, Yukon. This project involves hazardous material handling, soil remediation, site restoration, and site access restrictions. The selected contractor must demonstrate experience in handling contaminated materials and follow industry-specific environmental, safety, and management procedures.

## **Project Objectives:**

* Remediate three cells within the LTF by stripping previously bioremediated soil, disposing of the environmental liner, and backfilling and leveling the cells using bioremediated stockpiled soil and material from cell berms.
* Complete site preparations, safety measures, and site access restrictions.
* Rough grade the site and undertake project closure upon completion.

## **Deadlines:**

* Tender submission: October 13, 2023, at 14:00 hours MST.
* Site work completion: December 22, 2023.
* Final project completion: February 16, 2024.

## **Selection Criteria:**
Contractors will be selected based on their ability to meet mandatory requirements, including safety certifications, environmental management plans, and experience in hazardous material handling. The Government of Canada will award the contract to the bidder demonstrating the lowest price among eligible bidders.

## **Bid Process:**

* Qualified bidders will submit their bid electronically.
* Bidders must comply with all instructions provided in the project tender documents.
* CSPS will evaluate bids in accordance with the procurement methodology outlined in the tender documents.

## **Contracting Entity:**
Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
